meanings.definition: A restaurant or establishment where pizzas are made and sold.
meanings.sent1: We decided to order from the pizzerias down the street for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The pizzerias in our town offer a variety of toppings for their pizzas.
meanings.sent3: The pizzerias were so busy that they ran out of cheese for the pizzas!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly baked pizzas wafted from the pizzerias, tempting everyone nearby.
meanings.sent5: Visiting different pizzerias around the city became a fun weekend activity for us.

meanings.sent1: There are many pizzerias in this area, each with its unique style.
meanings.sent2: The group couldn't decide which of the pizzerias to visit for lunch.
meanings.sent3: The pizzerias on this street seem to be multiplying like mushrooms after rain!
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was dotted with pizzerias, resembling a constellation of delicious stars.
meanings.sent5: The pizzerias' neon signs lit up the night, inviting customers in for a slice.
